mapper.insert: insert into career (free_no,company_nm,join_date,quit_date,responsibility,job_lev) values ((select max(free_no) from freelancer),#{company_nm}, #{join_date},#{quit_date},#{responsibility},#{job_lev})
insert into license (free_no,license_nm,qualify_date,issuer) values ((select max(free_no) from freelancer),#{license_nm},#{qualify_date},#{issuer})
insert into skill (free_no,skill_nm,skill_lev) values((select max(free_no) from freelancer),#{skill_nm},#{skill_lev})
insert into region (free_no,region,district) values((select max(free_no) from freelancer),#{region},#{district})
